H1.text: where are the nordic countries. The Arctic Circle

H2.text: where are the nordic countries. The Baltic Sea Region

H3.text: where are the nordic countries. Northern Europe

A4.text: The Nordic countries are a geographical and cultural region in Northern Europe, as well as the Arctic and North Atlantic oceans.

A5.text: To the south, the countries neighbor the Baltic states, Poland, Germany and the United Kingdom

A6.text: The Arctic Circle passes through the Scandinavian Peninsula.

A7.text: The Arctic Circle is located in the Northern Hemisphere at approximately 66°34′N.
